ProductInfo.Features:
Passive; No power required / Built-in 16 channel passive transceivers in 1U rack mounting panel
Transmission distance up to 1000ft / 300m when working with passive transceivers / up to 2000ft / 600m when working with active receivers or transmitters
Built-in TVS (Transient Voltage Suppressors) for surge protection / Perfect for larger CCTV installations, and ideal for security monitoring stations
Panels can reside in the same rack as the other equipment(s), such as switchers, multiplexers, DVR, video conferencing
Use RJ45 Jack or 16 screw type terminal to connect between units
ProductInfo.Name: 16-Channel Passive Video Balun / Transceiver
